comments.body: According to the [react-avatar-edit](https://github.com/mosch/react-avatar-editor) documentation, the `className` can receive the type `String | String[]`. It would be nice to have tests for both cases too.

Thanks for taking a look Diogo,

That's not what the code does nor the usual React-way to handle this prop (afaik).
https://github.com/mosch/react-avatar-editor/blob/master/src/index.js#L150
https://github.com/mosch/react-avatar-editor/blob/master/src/index.js#L703

I've opened a ticket for clarification, in the meantime, could we assume the actual implementation is the reference and stick with `string`? 

 https://github.com/mosch/react-avatar-editor/issues/286
I just took a look at the component source. Think you are right.
